item.description:
I will be at the theater by 6:20, we will head in for seats around 6:50, show time is 7:20. Since it is showing upstairs, I will grab a table at the top of the escalator near the windows.

If you miss the group going in, we generally gather in the hall, outside the room the movie was shown in to discuss the movie a bit, allow for bathroom breaks and to get a head count of all those interested in going out after. Now that the Rockbottom has closed for renovations, I am not sure exactly where we will go after, but there are lots of places in the area.

Movie details:

Release Date: January 21, 2011
Studio: Paramount Pictures
Director: Ivan Reitman
Screenwriter: Elizabeth Meriwether
Starring: Ashton Kutcher, Natalie Portman, Greta Gerwig, Kevin Kline, Ophelia Lovibond, Ben Lawson, Chris Bridges, Olivia Thirlby, Jake M. Johnson, Lake Bell, Guy Brannum, Cary Elwes
Genre: Comedy, Romance
MPAA Rating: R (for sexual content, language and some drug material)
Official Website:
http://www.nostringsa...

Plot Summary: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin and will also have a meetup sign. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will try to grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If it is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: No Strings Attached
